articles.title: Experts reflect on a decade of Wild Polio-Free Certification for the WHO South-East Asia Region (SEARO) – GPEI - Global Polio Eradication Initiative
articles.content:
What was your role in the fight to end wild polio in Southeast Asia/your country?
My fight against polio in India started way back in 1995 during the first immunization drive (NID). Back then, Rotar… [+3604 chars]
